title: Episode 22: Delivery Complete
text: 1. PICK UP empty pod at anti-vibration-pods-room
2. [SECURE] Robot picks up mart-east-core-drill in pod at anti-vibration-pods-room
3. Robot moves with mart-east-core-drill in pod: anti-vibration-pods-room -> maintenance-tunnel
4. Robot moves with mart-east-core-drill in pod: maintenance-tunnel -> hall-b
5. UNLOAD mart-east-core-drill from pod at hall-b
• Action Result: UNLOAD mart-east-core-drill from pod at hall-b
